name: Margaret Paul

jv_history.partner_name: Margaret Paul, PhD - Inner Bonding® Educational Technologies, Inc.
jv_history.source_quote: PhD is the best-selling author and co-author of twelve published books, including "Do I Have To Give Up ... Relationships Through the Six-Step Pathway of Inner Bonding." She is the co-creator of the p

what_you_do: Dr. Margaret Paul is a counselor and creator of the Inner Bonding process, a psychological and spiritual healing method for anxiety, depression, addictions, and failed relationships.
who_you_serve: Individuals and couples struggling with anxiety, depression, addictions, relationship problems, self-abandonment, and feelings of unworthiness.
social_proof: Endorsed by Alanis Morissette, John Gray (Men Are from Mars), Lindsay Wagner, Neale Donald Walsch, and Jack Canfield.
signature_programs: Inner Bonding, Love Yourself: A 30-Day Inner Bonding Experience, SelfQuest, Intimate Relationship Toolbox (12-Week e-Course), Permanent Weight Loss 12-Week e-Course, Inner Bonding Weekend Workshop, Inner Bonding 5-Day Intensive Retreat, Unlocking Your Inner Wisdom (30-Day course), Wildly Deeply Joyously in Love, Attracting Your Beloved (30-Day course), Passionate Purpose Vibrant Health (30-Day course)
business_focus: Guiding individuals and couples through healing pain and self-abandonment using the Inner Bonding process to achieve self-love and healthier relationships.
service_provided: Individual Skype and telephone counseling sessions, conjoint counseling sessions, weekend workshops, 5-day intensive retreats, online e-courses, 30-day at-home experiences
